lines.text: African vampires don't like Chinese blood.

[while being chased by one guard]
Jackie! Save us!

[while fighting five guards]
I'm busy!

[while holding a gun to his head and threatening to kill him, but the guards betrayed Adolf]
You call my bluff. I'll count to three. Drop your guns or he's dead. 1,2... 3
[He throws the gun down]
Well, he wins.
If you don't kill him I will.

[Discovering one guard is missing]
It's strange, your grandfather had eighteen guards. Fifteen down here and two up there, that's only seventeen.
Where's the last one.

[Comes into the tunnel with other guards and guns]
Don't move.
I'm the eighteenth guard.

[a piece of gold falls out of Jackie's pocket after they just escaped the base before it blew up]
The constolation prize.

[At the guards they just catured, with a gun in her hands]
I'll shoot.
Better believe her boys, she shoots like a maniac.
Not a move
[Suddenly she slips, falls, and empties the gun of ammunition almost shooting someone]
Where are you from?

[last lines, shoots a gun at them]
Ohh, the gods, they led them back to us.

[throws them the gold piece]
Here, here is the gold you wanted.
Who wants gold, we want water.

[throws them an empty jug]
here you can have the rest of this, if there is anything left
[they fight over it]
it just goes to show that we never know what we need or want.
I never thought I would see people fighting over water.

[notices that it is empty]
Water, WATER!
I suggest that we get together and look for it.
[to Ada]
Well your our desert expert, where do you think we should go?
I think we should head that way, there should be an owaysiss to the north.
No, I think we should go this way.
No, we have to listen to our desert expert.
Ohh, we must have crossed over a million sand dunes.

[as the camera pulls away eventually showing that they'er in the middle of the desert]
I'm sure it's just over the next one. As I was saying, only a quarter of the desert is covered with sand.
The gods must be angry with us.

[hitting him with a stick thinking he is a burglar]
Take that, get out you thief, out, out...
It's me you idiot
[he sighs painfully]
IT'S ME! I knew you wanted to hit me, but did you have to hit so hard.

[sacasticly]
Yes, sure I knew it was you and that was why I hit so hard.

[comes out with a machine gun]
Where are these burglars?
Over there. What are you waiting for? Shoot them!
Pay me.
What.
No money, no shoot.

[she gives him money]
Ohh, there.
Ohhh, that's good
[gives gun to Elsa]
you shoot.
Me, why?
Good deal.
DON'T LET GO!

[the fan starts up agian]
It's a sucksion.
Dead talk.
Quick, this whole place is going to explode Jackie.
Explode?

[looking at the bomb]
What, we only have twenty minutes?
We were trying to help and then Elsa had to press that button.
[first lines]
Not a good start

[in pain failing to get diamonds]
All that for nothing.

[after he snuk into her house and has a bad guy pinned down, to Jackie]
Who are you?

[to the bad guy]
Who are you?
I asked you first.
Let me ask first
[to bad guy]
who are you?
Jump, I'll catch you
[gets distracted and misses them]
sorry.

[walks up to ask a man for his motorcycle and accidentally points a gun at the man]
Hey you there
[he runs away thinking he is going to shoot him]
no wait.

[accidentaly falls on a woman's car]
Sorry.
Oley!
